(Library of Congress, 2000) ; "Herblock's History" (Library of Congress, 2000) ; "Al Hirschfeld, Beyond Broadway" (Library of Congress, 2000-2001) ; "Politics in Black and White" (Montgomery College, Rockville, Md., 2000) ; "Cartoons and Campaigns" (The Newseum, Arlington, Va., 2000) ; "Pens and Needles" (The Newseum, Arlington, Va., 2000-2001) ; "Yes, Virginia, There is a Santa Claus" (The Newseum, Arlington, Va., 2000) ; "The Art of John Cederquist" (National Museum of American Art's Renwick Gallery, Smithsonian Institution, 2000).
